name: UIVideoEditorControllerDelegate
desc: A set of methods that your delegate object must implement to respond to the video editor.

items.name: func videoEditorController(UIVideoEditorController, didSaveEditedVideoToPath: String)
items.desc: Called when the system has finished saving an edited movie.

items.name: func videoEditorControllerDidCancel(UIVideoEditorController)
items.desc: Called when the user has cancelled a movie editing operation.

items.name: func videoEditorController(UIVideoEditorController, didFailWithError: Error)
items.desc: Called when the video editor is unable to load or save a movie.
